articles.description: Kate Middleton ditched her engagement ring for her appearance at the Commonwealth Games with Prince William and Princess Charlotte
articles.content:
Kate Middleton ditched her engagement ring and opted to wear her Welsh gold wedding band only when she joined her husband and daughter at the Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

articles.author: Peter Bradshaw
articles.title: The Harder They Come review – Jimmy Cliff falls hard in visceral revenge western - The Guardian
articles.description: Fifty years on, this crime drama of a headstrong singer shooting for his chance of success is as raw and energetic as its reggae soundtrack
articles.content: Perry Henzells visceral 1972 Jamaican crime drama exists between the two moods of its two most famous tracks: the aspirational lesson of You Can Get It If You Really Want and the disillusioned downfa… [+3689 chars]

articles.title: Darlington's Big Brother winner appears on This Morning and makes desperate plea - The Northern Echo
articles.description: Big Brother's Anthony Hutton has expressed his delight after it was confirmed the iconic programme would be returning to our screens next year.
